item.title: About
item.description: I live in Cracow, Poland and I work as security engineer at Base. I try to better understand world around me and I fail miserably. But everyday I am better at failing. Contact I’ll be happy to chat with you, drop me an email at ecneladis@gmail.com. You can find me on Twitter, Github, Instagram and LinkedIn. Copyright Â© Michal Marek 2017
